comments:
Description:
NPE when delete two cubes in attached report.
Build number:2.2.0.v20070604

Steps to reproduce:
1. Open attached report.
2. Select regioncredit and regioncredit1.
3. Press delete button.

Expected result:
Two cubes are deleted

Actual result:
NPE and cubes are still there.
